author: donaldp
msg: Added support for Log4j logger configuration from within the environment.xml file. Uses the Log4j schema and underlying toolkit.

msg: ConfigurationUtil moved to main Framework tree.

author: donaldp
msg: Added a Log4jConfLoggerManager class that will configure the Log4j system based on supplied configuration. The configuration schema is the same as the Log4J format.

author: donaldp
msg: Add a utility class to convert a Configuration tree into a w3c DOM tree
